text:
"K.I.S.S." (abbreviation of "Keep It Sexy & Simple") is the sixth studio album by American singer and songwriter Mýa. It is her second album to be released on Manhattan Records. The album was later re-released as a deluxe version with new songs for her American fans on February 14, 2012.
Reception.
"K.I.S.S." received generally positive reviews from music critics.
